desiredAmount.description: Required for "MANUAL" and "SCHEDULED" auto scaling group. Number of instances to be launched

minimumAmount.description: Required for "CPU_BASED". The minimum number of instances that should be running

maximumAmount.description: Required for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. The maximum number of instances that can be running

cpuThreshold.description: Required for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. The target average CPU utilization for scaling

warmupTime.description: Required for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. Warm-up time in seconds for new instances

cooldownTime.description: Required for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. Cool-down time in seconds for new instances

instanceId.description: The instance on which instances will be based on. This instance needs to be either Running or Stopped

reference.description: The identifying name set to the auto scaling group

startsAt.description: Required for "SCHEDULED" auto scaling group. Date and time (UTC) that the instances need to be launched

endsAt.description: Required for "SCHEDULED" auto scaling group. Date and time (UTC) that the instances need to be terminated
